expo.name: Baby Food Tracker
expo.description: Track your baby's nutrition with ease using our Baby Food Tracker app. From baby-led weaning to traditional feeding methods, our user-friendly interface makes it simple to log breast milk, formula, and solid foods, and track portion sizes and daily feeding schedules. Stay on top of your child's nutritional intake with detailed graphs and metrics focused on food groups. Upgrade to our Premium Service Option to track multiple children and allergies. Download now for the ultimate tool in supporting your baby's health and development through weaning and baby-led feeding.
